class Gffcompare[source]

Gffcompare(software, fd) :: Base

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import configparser

config=configparser.ConfigParser()
config.read('pybiotools/default.ini')



gffcompare=Gffcompare('gffcompare',config['gffcompare'])
gffcompare

gffcompare:gffcompare
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gffcompare.cmd_version()

'echo gffcompare:gffcompare ;echo $(gffcompare --version)'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gffcompare.cmd_gffcompare(None, 'reference', 'prefix', ['gtf1','gtf2'])

'gffcompare -M -N -T -o prefix -r reference gtf1 gtf2'
